comment.author: Derek
comment.text: Here we go with the idiots saying "I'm with her" and "madam president" and "Hillary for president!". What a bunch of drones you all are.

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: And you're a TROLL. Mindlessly following a RAPIST without a plan.

replies.author: Scott
replies.text: Can't you find a Trump rally online to throw your hate speech around? Nobody cares obviously. Trump for Trouble Makers.

replies.author: Charles
replies.text: dumb trump troll go some where else!!!

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: If only you "useful idiots" we're actually "useful", what a world that would be!
